featured.text: The paths of various religions also crossed here: Muslims have lived peacefully with Christians and Buddhists on the islands for centuries.
Buddhism is the _____ religion in Thailand, with 90% of the total population identified as Buddhists.

definition.zh_def: 信仰佛教的人，追隨佛陀的教導。
definition.en_def: People who follow the teachings of Buddhism and the Buddha.
definition.example: Many Buddhists practice meditation to achieve inner peace.
